actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Economic and Educational.
On agreeing to the Economic and Educational amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute allows an exemption under the Fair Labor Standards Act for official court reporters while they are performing transcription duties and being paid on a per-page basis.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunity.
